#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>

unsigned long long int a[1000005];

int main()
{
    unsigned long long int n,i,j,count=0;
    scanf("%llu", &n);
    for(i=0;i<1000000;i++){
        a[i] = 0;
    }

    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%llu", &j);
        a[j]++;
    }

    j = ((n-1)*n)/2;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(a[i]>1){
            j = j - (a[i]-1)*a[i]/2;
        }
        ;
    }

    printf("%llu", j);

    return 0;
}
